Reviews.Title: Great Windows Mobile Phone with Issues
Reviews.Author: Jacel
Reviews.Content: I bought this unlocked phone for use here in Costa Rica. The phone was cool and worked well except one thing. I purchased a 16gb miscorSD w/ this phone hoping I could put more music and my audiobooks on it. After adding 1,000 songs on the phone, it always froze the phone everytime I try to play my music. It just pissede off, so I ended up having around 300 songs left only on my phone. Why do they advise customers to buy a 16gb miscorSD along with this device if the phone processor could not hold it?On the other hand, picture quality is so cool...same as iphone camera quality. My jaybird sportsband bluetooth headphone also works with it and my audiobooks can also be stored here.For the price I paid of about $190 together w/ the microSD, its not a great buy but at least no either bad at all.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: cook3284
Reviews.Content: POS, I used the headphone jack 5 times now my phone thinks that there is always a headset plugged in which means i can't hear or say anything  when making a call. I tried everything on the forums to remedy the problem so now after only a week in a half i have a $150 paper weight. If you think I am full of it go online and search for stays in headset mode and read all the forums. Only difference is theirs happened while there was still a warranty on this phone.

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: No service
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone last year in August, and only had the phone for a couple months this phone do not work properly and no good service  in the country please buy with consonance

Reviews.Title: Life made simple with HTC
Reviews.Author: Wajid Hussein
Reviews.Content: I was offered a BlackBerry before and I got rid of it, cause so costly to maintain and very complicated to use indeed. With this HTC it's like having a little laptop in hand. I am very content with it. If you use it for simple purposes and you are not too demanding then you will enjoy this phone. Now everything is made so simple and right at your fingertips. Everything my BB use to do, it does it in a very simple manner and frustration free. I can now use my phone professionally and without having BBM popping each seconds I am reading a work email or having issues installing a very needed application... I can now focus on my work instead of the screen of my long gone BB. I sure am HTC convert now, I cannot imagine myself using any other brand. Goodbye BB and say Hello to HTC.

Reviews.Title: HTC Imagio
Reviews.Author: Beth Bench
Reviews.Content: Really like th phone but it is a unlocked Verision phone. this was not mentioned in the descrition of this phone. I have ATT. so what to do.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO
Reviews.Author: WIDLIVE
Reviews.Content: UNA BELLEZA DE TELÉFONO ME ENCANTO,LA SERIEDAD DEL VENDEDOR EXCELENTE PRODUCTO DE MUY BUENA CALIDAD EL ÚNICO INCONVENIENTE QUE VIENE EN IDIOMA INGLES PERO PASA A LAS PERSONAS QUE COMPREN ESTE PRODUCTO LES RECOMIENDO BAJARSE EL MANUAL EN ESPAÑOL POR EL RESTO EXCELENTE LOS RECOMIENDO.

Reviews.Title: Its Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Keenan "keenan"
Reviews.Content: The phone is a great to use only for Verizon. I bought mines and I couldn't use it with metro, so I'm going to sell the phone to someone else.

Reviews.Title: Marty's review
Reviews.Author: martel walker
Reviews.Content: Good phone for the price I paid. Had some problems with t-mobile setting up voicemail, but they solved it. Haven't called Verizon about the all points network info yet to get internet without wifi. Everything seems to  be working.

Reviews.Title: Worthless on Cricket
Reviews.Author: dustjms "Life is a Carwash"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to get my girlfriend into the smartphone world for cheap.  Here are my thoughts:I saw that one reviewer said they weren't able to get the internet working on this phone.  We didn't buy from Amazon but bought an unlocked version of this one, elsewhere.  We were able to get the internet working but I have to be honest and say that I hate this phone.  I am an Android user so I'm not used to Windows Mobile, but I am an IT savvy person and this is so difficult to navigate it's just down right frustrating.  I messed with it for 2 hours last night and finally figured out how to change the theme on it.  I am trying to put apps on it and the Windows Marketplace was closed last year so getting apps for this thing is very difficult.  It is mostly Verizon user friendly, and we are on Cricket, so that doesn't help.  We were told all features would work (Cricket's fault), but we can't get pics to send in text.  You can't upgrade to Windows 7.0 mobile from the 6.5 that's on here.  It's the slowest phone I have ever used but I am used to a Galaxy Nexus.  Most websites don't work and tapping to get to anything (links) is impossible.To sum it up, I DO NOT recommend this phone.  As I stated above, I used this phone as a cheap way to get my gf into the smartphone world.  I can honestly say that I wasted over $100 buying  this thing, then flashing it, and activating it, just to get on Cricket.  I could have used that money towards a new Android phone by the time this was all over.  She doesn't know it yet but I'm going to the store to switch the phone this week.  They said they'd waive the activation fee, yay!

Reviews.Title: An okay phone
Reviews.Author: Cassie Blount
Reviews.Content: This phone was just okay. It's very unique with how the menu works and looks. My problems i had with this phone was that it would freeze every now and then and some of the buttons began not working towards the end of my times with it. I ended up having to order a new phone after about maybe 8 months to a year. I was super excited when i got it, but it wasn't all i thought it to be. I wasn't able to get internet with it because it's one of those phones that even though it's unlocked, this one HAS to be used with it's carrier (verizon wireless) in order for ALL of the features to work which are talk, text, internet, and picture sending. i was able to get talk and text, but no internet which bummed me out. so i was careful with then next unlocked phone I bought so that i would b able to use all of the features. but all out it's alright. i would only reccomend it to people who plan to use verizon service.

Reviews.Title: nice deal
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: Very good article, very good deal nice, very good price, item arrived on time, the packaging had an acceptable size

Reviews.Title: HTC Imagio XV6975 Unlocked Phone with Windows Mobile 6.5, GPS, Wi-Fi, 5MP Camera and Touchscreen - No Warranty - Black HTC Imagi
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: I bought "HTC Imagio XV6975 Unlocked Phone with Windows Mobile 6.5, GPS, Wi-Fi, 5MP Camera and Touchscreen - No Warranty - Black" approximately 10 days ago and would like to thank the seller for the on-time shipment and great mobile phone that I got for a great price. It performs to its fullest, is brand new, elegant and has almost all features that HTC HD2 has; and most importantly costs much less than HD2. The screen colors are amazingly distinct and bright. The touch screen works well. The Camera takes very good quality pictures and all applications that I have installed using the Marketplace are also fully operable... Go get one like this if you really fancy Windows Mobile phones!!!

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: IT_Guy
Reviews.Content: Works great, looks sexy + the price is excellent (i got mine for $140)...Camera - extremely good (can be compared to the iphone)Speakers - goodWifi - goodOS - WM 6.5 - not too bad (would have loved android on this baby)5 stars........great phone....fast shipping & delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: wmlover
Reviews.Content: A top and final WM machine. sad!Everything is perfect except lack of a pilot button.  If you are a windows mobile lover' don't miss this.

Reviews.Title: htc imagio
Reviews.Author: tmalcombe
Reviews.Content: great phone for the cost. it took me a little bit to figure out the network settings for at&t.; freezes up sometimes but not very often. the only complaint I have is the app selection is kind of small but it does come with some good ones already installed including windows apps. but all in all I am satisfied with my htc imagio. it has a lot of nest featuers and a pretty good camera and great if you have a windows pc. layout and menus are pretty simple. I would suggest buying this phone if you're not eligible for an upgrade and not looking to spend a whole lot.

Reviews.Title: calish
Reviews.Author: calish
Reviews.Content: in my opinion this product is great, im love. htc is a very good brand and this cell phone is perfect for me, the only is the operative sistem im prefer the android but im happy.. im recomended
